text: Jack Burns (6 October 1918 – 24 August 1995) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile from Collingwood Forever Category:1918 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Ivanhoe Amateurs Football Club players
title: Jack Burns (Australian footballer)
